/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and trucks, hinting at the city's active transportation system. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in urban landscapes. In the distance, trees add a touch of nature to the urban setting.
